title: Machine learning algorithm for predicting 30-day mortality in patients receiving rapid response system activation: A retrospective nationwide cohort study
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Takeo Kurita, Takehiko Oami, Yoko Tochigi, Keisuke Tomita, Takaki Naito, Kazuaki Atagi, Shigeki Fujitani, Taka-aki Nakada, IHER-J collaborators
